participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and driven, always looking for ways to inspire others.
participant_1.background: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i'm a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and spontaneous, always seeking thrills and new experiences.
participant_2.background: i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all. i do like watching cooking shows. hello i just moved here from germany.

content.text: i am not sure what that means . i am more of a couch potato .

are you japanese ? i am from the united kingdom .
